OUTLINE : This phase I , dose-escalation study tipifarnib follow phase II study . Patients receive tipifarnib orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) day 1-14 gemcitabine hydrochloride intravenously ( IV ) 30 minute day 1 8 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
